text: Tommy Shane Steiner (born October 9, 1973 in Austin, Texas) is an American country music artist. He made his debut in 2001 with the single "What If She's an Angel". The song reached No. 2 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks charts. It was the first of three chart singles from his singular album Then Came the Night which was released in 2002. The album peaked at No. 6 on the Country Albums chart. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Then Came the Night (2002) ;Singles * "What If She's an Angel" (2001) ==Related pages== * List of country musicians from Texas ==Sources== Category:American country musicians Category:Musicians from Iowa Category:Country musicians from Texas Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:RCA Records artists
title: Tommy Shane Steiner
